title: Don’t Sign that Lease! Quick Move-In – NEW 4-Bedroom Home
posting_body: Rent prices are on the rise and becoming a happy homeowner is the perfect solution!
This amazing 1-story, 4-bedroom home is loaded with upgrades and waiting for you to schedule your tour to fall in love.
Call TODAY to learn how easily your dream of homeownership can become a reality!
Luxury Plank Flooring, Polished Granite Countertops, 42” Upper Cabinetry
Easy access to the rapidly growing shopping, dining, and employment centers of both Conroe and The Woodlands
Fishable lake with extended pier, paved walking trails, community park, children’s playground, tennis court, zoned to highly acclaimed Conroe ISD, incredible nearby attractions.
* P & I. Price $359,900, 5.625% Fixed/ 6.711% APR, 3.5% Down, FHA 30 Year, OAC from third party lender.
Other fees such as taxes, insurance and HOA are not included in the sample monthly payment amount.
Prices and rates are subject to change without notice.
